name: Calendar
author: Leon Zhang, Matthew Claypotch
description: A port of Potch's fortnight.js calendar UI in component form

documentation.description: A port of Potch's fortnight.js calendar UI in component form

attributes.controls: Controls the visibility of the calendar's navigation controls; usage is similar to the 'controls' attribute of <video> elements
attributes.multiple: Controls whether or not multiple calendar dates can be chosen simultaneously
attributes.span: Specifies the number of months displayed at once by the calendar
attributes.view: Specifies the Date to focus the calendar display on. For example, a view of Dec 25 2013 and a span of 3 would result in a calendar displaying the months of Nov 2013, Dec 2013, and Jan 2014
attributes.chosen: Specifies the date or dates that are toggled as chosen on the calendar. Can be specified as either a singular parsable date string or as a JSON string representing a list of both singular dates and [Date, Date] lists of the start and end date for a range of dates
attributes.disable-ui-toggle: If set, the default date-toggling behavior of the UI is disabled. However, dates can still be programmatically chosen/toggled.
